topinfo.title: Users
topinfo.desc: Display all information.You can maintain user information and assign roles.

topinfo.title: Teams
topinfo.desc: Display all information.You can maintain user information and assign roles.

modal.title: Do you Want to delete these item?
modal.content: After deletion,the data cannot be recovered.

teamItem.teaminfo: You can manage user organizations, including adding and adjusting the organizational structure.

administrator.title: The administrator has the following permissions:
administrator.desc1: 1.Manage organizations and users in system settings.
administrator.desc2: 2.Have the highest privileges in other apps, possessing access to all data and the ability to perform all functionality operations.

normalusers.title: Normal  users have the following permissions:
normalusers.desc2: 2. In other apps, have data access rights only for their own organization.
normalusers.desc3: 3. In other apps, have only operational permissions for using pages, with management pages having view-only access.
